Jx.Plugin

Extend: Jx.Object

Base class for all plugins.  In order for a plugin to be used it must extend from this class.

Summary
Jx.PluginExtend: Jx.Object
Functions
attachEmpty method that must be overridden by subclasses.
detachEmpty method that must be overridden by subclasses.
changeTextThis method should be overridden by subclasses.

Functions

attach

attach: function(obj)

Empty method that must be overridden by subclasses.  It is called by the user of the plugin to setup the plugin for use.

detach

detach: function(obj)

Empty method that must be overridden by subclasses.  It is called by the user of the plugin to remove the plugin.

changeText

changeText: function (lang)

This method should be overridden by subclasses.  It should be used to change any language specific default text that is used by the widget.

Parameters

langthe language being changed to or that had it’s data set of translations changed.
Base class for all other object in the JxLib framework.
